channel.title: Coloring pages for boys on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Coloring pages for boys on Game6r

item.title: Cartoon Cars Coloring Book
item.description: Online coloring for boys Cars is a great way to develop a child’s ability to concentrate, memory, perseverance and accuracy. As a rule, children are attracted to non-childish games from childhood. They even draw, unlike the girls, big fire trucks, military tanks, planes and police motorcycles. Of course, car coloring pages can be downloaded and printed, and then you can decorate as much as you like. And, you can play online, try and start again, experimenting with the colors of your car, its tuning and decorations.

item.title: Garbage Trucks Coloring
item.description: Refresh the design of this boring truck. Use all the available paints to get creative and create some cool options. You can depict on board the logo of some trading company or just a multi-colored rainbow. You also have the opportunity to decorate the road and nearby buildings. Make the picture bright and colorful.

item.title: Halloween Coloring Book
item.description: Tell your friends about a fun Halloween holiday with the help of pictures with images of the characters participating in it. And in order to more vividly convey the meaning of the celebration, try to make these drawings as colorful and bright as possible. Choose the right color from the palette with the help of a virtual brush, making full use of your skills as an artist.

item.title: Off-Road Coloring Book
item.description: This game is designed specifically for boys. You have a choice of 16 pictures with cars of different brands. You can color them in any order. Pick up a brush, or rather, a mouse, and get to work. In order to paint a certain part of the car in the selected color, just click on it with the left mouse button.
